TypeSignature.Value: public sealed class MenuItemCollection : System.Collections.ICollection, System.Web.UI.IStateManager

public ref class MenuItemCollection sealed : System::Collections::ICollection, System::Web::UI::IStateManager
type MenuItemCollection = class interface ICollection interface IEnumerable interface IStateManager

summary.span: 表示 控制項中功能表項目的集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of menu items in a control.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別用來儲存和管理的集合中的物件控制項。The class is used to store and manage a collection of objects in the control. 控制項會使用中的類別來儲存其根功能表項目屬性。The control uses the class to store its root menu items in the property. 此集合也可用於屬性物件來儲存功能表項目的子功能表項目 （如果有的話）。This collection is also used for the property of a object to store a menu item's submenu items (if any). 類別支援數種方式可存取集合中的項目：The class supports several ways to access the items in the collection: - 使用用來直接擷取索引子特定的以零為起始索引處的物件。Use the indexer to directly retrieve a object at a specific zero-based index. - 使用方法，以建立可用來逐一查看集合的列舉值。Use the method to create an enumerator that can be used to iterate through the collection. - 使用方法，將集合的內容複製到陣列。Use the method to copy the contents of the collection into an array. 您可以透過程式設計方式管理新增和移除的物件物件。You can programmatically manage a object by adding and removing objects. 若要加入集合中的功能表項目，請使用或方法。To add menu items to the collection, use the or the method. 若要從集合中移除節點，使用，則，或方法。To remove nodes from the collection, use the , the , or the method. > [!NOTE] > 當控制項繫結至資料來源和集合會自動填入每個繫結，就會發生的時間。When the control is bound to a data source, the and collections are automatically populated each time binding occurs. 集合，繫結之間的任何變更將會遺失。Any changes to the collections between bindings will be lost. 若要保留這些變更，更新資料來源或是手動重建每次您將繫結的集合。To retain these changes, either update the data source or manually rebuild the collection each time you bind. 類別包含屬性和方法可讓您擷取集合本身的相關資訊。The class contains properties and methods that allow you to retrieve information about the collection itself. 若要了解在集合中有多少項目，使用屬性。To find out how many items are in the collection, use the property. 如果您想要判斷集合是否包含特定物件，請使用方法。If you want to determine whether the collection contains a certain object, use the method. 若要取得的索引物件在集合中，使用方法。To get the index of a object in the collection, use the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以填入和使用宣告式語法的集合。The following code example demonstrates how to populate the and collections using declarative syntax. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuDeclarative#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuDeclarative/CS/menudeclarativecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuDeclarative#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuDeclarative/VB/menudeclarativevb.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何以程式設計方式新增物件至根功能表項目的集合。The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically add a object to the collection of a root menu item. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuItemCollectionAdd#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemCollectionAdd/CS/menuitemcollectionaddcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuItemCollectionAdd#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemCollectionAdd/VB/menuitemcollectionaddvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 使用預設值，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the default values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式初始化的新執行個體類別使用的預設值。Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class using the default values. 這個建構函式通常用於建立集合的根功能表項目在父功能表 （或擁有者） 不需要。This constructor is commonly used when creating a collection of root menu items where a parent menu (or owner) is not required. > [!NOTE] > 建立集合時的子功能表項目，您應該使用多載的建構函式採用`owner`參數，而不是這個建構函式，以指定的父功能表項目。When creating a collection of child menu items, you should use the overloaded constructor that takes the `owner` parameter, instead of this constructor, to specify the parent menu item. 在擴充主要由控制項開發人員使用這個建構函式初始化的控制項屬性。This constructor is used primarily by control developers when extending the control to initialize the property.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem owner) cil managed

summary.span: 使用指定的父功能表項目 (或擁有人)，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified parent menu item (or owner).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式初始化的新執行個體類別使用指定的父功能表項目 （或擁有者）。Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class using the specified parent menu item (or owner). 這個建構函式常用建立子功能表項目集合時，您需要指定父功能表項目。This constructor is commonly used when creating a collection of child menu items where you need to specify the parent menu item. > [!NOTE] > 建立集合時的 根功能表項目，請考慮使用預設建構函式，因為根功能表項目沒有父功能表項目。When creating a collection of root menu items, consider using the default constructor because root menu items do not have a parent menu item. 在擴充主要由控制項開發人員使用這個建構函式類別來初始化屬性。This constructor is used primarily by control developers when extending the class to initialize the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法用來建立列舉值，可以輕鬆地逐一查看透過以取得每個項目在目前物件。Use the method to create an enumerator that can be easily iterated through to get each item in the current object. 若要取得列舉值目前指向的項目，請使用屬性。To get the item currently pointed to in the enumerator, use the property. 使用方法，以移至下一個項目。Use the method to move to the next item. 如果您需要將列舉程式移回集合的開頭，使用方法。If you need to move the enumerator back to the beginning of the collection, use the method. > [!NOTE] > 在您建立的列舉值，或使用之後方法，您必須呼叫方法。After you create an enumerator or use the method, you must call the method. 項目，否則為表示屬性未定義。Otherwise, the item represented by the property is undefined. 或者，您也可以使用方法來複製集合至陣列中的項目。As an alternative, you can also use the method to copy the items in the collection to an array. 您接著可以使用陣列來存取集合中的項目。You can then use the array to access the items in the collection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法用來建立列舉值，包含子功能表項目的`Music`中的功能表項目控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to create an enumerator that contains the submenu items of the `Music` menu item in a control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性用來表示存取是否物件同步處理 （安全執行緒）。The property is used to indicate whether access to the object is synchronized (thread safe). 此屬性衍生自類別，並會覆寫以一律傳回`false`。This property is derived from the class and is overridden to always return `false`. 如需詳細資訊屬性，請參閱 < 屬性介面。For more information on the property, see the property of the interface.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Remove(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem value) cil managed

span.span: The object to remove.

summary.span: 從 物件移除指定的 物件。

span.span: Removes the specified object from the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法，以從集合中移除指定的功能表項目。Use the method to remove the specified menu item from the collection. 然後遵循該功能表項目的所有項目都會往上移，以填滿空的位置。All items that follow that menu item are then moved up to fill in the vacant position. 此外，也會更新已移動項目的索引。The indexes of the moved items are also updated. > [!NOTE] > 物件可以包含 null 值，以及重複物件。The object can contain null values, as well as duplicate objects. 或者，您可以移除功能表項目集合中特定索引使用方法。As an alternative, you can remove a menu item from a specific index in the collection by using the method. 您也可以移除集合中所有功能表項目，使用方法。You can also remove all menu items from the collection by using the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法，以程式設計方式移除物件從物件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to programmatically remove a object from a object. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuItemCollectionRemove#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemCollectionRemove/CS/menuitemcollectionremovecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuItemCollectionRemove#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemCollectionRemove/VB/menuitemcollectionremovevb.aspx#1)]

span.span: is .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void RemoveAt(int32 index) cil managed

param.name: index
param.span: 要移除功能表項目之以零起始的索引位置。

span.span: The zero-based index location of the menu item to remove.

summary.span: 從目前 物件中移除指定索引位置的 物件。

span.span: Removes the object at the specified index location from the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法來移除從集合指定的索引位置的物件。Use the method to remove the object at the specified index location from the collection. 然後遵循該功能表項目的所有項目都會往上移，以填滿空的位置。All items that follow that menu item are then moved up to fill in the vacant position. 此外，也會更新已移動項目的索引。The indexes of the moved items are also updated. > [!NOTE] > 物件可以包含 null 值，以及重複物件。The object can contain null values, as well as duplicate objects. 或者，您可以移除特定物件使用方法。As an alternative, you can remove a specific object by using the method. 您也可以移除集合中所有功能表項目，使用方法。You can also remove all menu items from the collection by using the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法，以程式設計方式移除物件從中指定的索引位置的物件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to programmatically remove a object from a object at a specified index location. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuItemCollectionRemoveAt#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemCollectionRemoveAt/CS/menuitemcollectionremoveatcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuItemCollectionRemoveAt#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemCollectionRemoveAt/VB/menuitemcollectionremoveatvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SyncRoot As Object
public: property System::Object ^ SyncRoot { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得可用來同步處理對 物件之存取的物件。

span.span: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the object.

value.span: ，可用於同步處理 的存取。

span.span: An that can be used to synchronize access to the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性提供的同步處理的版本可以搭配同步處理 （執行緒） 的程式碼的物件。The property provides a synchronized version of the object that can be used with synchronizing (threading) code. > [!CAUTION] > 屬性的類別一律會傳回`false`，這表示類別不會同步處理 （不具備執行緒安全）。The property of this class always returns `false`, which indicates that the class is not synchronized (not thread safe). 同步處理程式碼必須在執行作業的物件集合中，不要直接依賴物件本身。Synchronizing code must perform operations on the object of the collection, not directly on the object itself. 如此可確保衍生自其他物件的集合可以正常運作，This ensures proper operation of collections that are derived from other objects. 具體來說，它會維護適當的同步處理的其他執行緒可能同時修改物件。Specifically, it maintains proper synchronization with other threads that might be simultaneously modifying the object. > [!NOTE] > 在此實作中傳回的物件是物件，用來儲存集合中的物件。The object returned in this implementation is the object used to store the objects in the collection. 透過集合進行列舉在本質上並非安全執行緒程序。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使集合經過同步化，其他執行緒仍然可以修改集合中，導致擲回例外狀況的列舉值。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads could still modify the collection, causing the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要保證列舉過程的執行緒安全，您可以在整個列舉過程中鎖定集合，或攔截由其他執行緒的變更所造成的例外狀況。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. 如需詳細資訊屬性，請參閱 < 屬性介面。For more information on the property, see the property of the interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在伺服器控制項，呼叫這個方法之後屬性會傳回`true`。After this method has been called on a server control, the property returns `true`.
